Texts.Chs: 其余部分完全致力于适当的竞技场礼仪，争端解决和王室的规则和条例，并在所有事物中正确地尊重荣誉。
Texts.Eng: The rest is entirely devoted to proper Arena etiquette, dispute settling and Kingsryche rules and regulations, and on the proper observation of honor in all things.

Texts.Chs: 这本绝对巨大的大部头里包含了三千页关于剑的学习，技术，模式，姿态等等只是。对于一个历史学家或者想要学习夜族人剑术风格的人来说，这确实是一项很好的发现。书中有整整一章专门讲述如何正确清洁刀刃，如何通过一种叫做暗影回火的工艺除锈和改进刀刃，以及如何正确解决社会中常见的问题，如偷窃刀片和故意损坏传家宝武器。
Texts.Eng: This absolutely enormous tome is three thousand pages of sword study, techniques, patterns, stances and so much more. Truly a wonderful find for a historian or someone looking to learn swordplay in the style of the Nightar. There are entire chapters devoted to proper cleaning of blades, how to remove rust and improve the blade by a process called Shadow-Tempering, and proper resolutions to common problems in their society such as stolen blades and intentional damaging of heirloom weapons.
